content.question: The author’s decision to repeat the word “forget” in the sixth and seventh paragraphs primarily serves to

choices.label: underscore the author’s disapproval of those who neglect to improve their writing
indicate the order in which the author believes certain steps should be taken
suggest a parallel between two distinct ideas that the author challenges
convey the author’s ambivalence about the advice she received early in her career

content.answer: suggest a parallel between two distinct ideas that the author challenges

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
